title: Fluorescent carbon dot embedded silica nanocomposites as tracers for hydrogeological investigations: a sustainable approach

The injected tracer technique using nanoparticles has evoked a lot of research interest in hydrogeological research as it encompasses a broad spectrum of applications in water resource management.
